tool.name: ExportLoS
tool.displayname: Export Line of Sight into CSV

param.name: in_los
param.dialogReference: Input Lines of Sight in form of Feature Layer.

param.name: in_id
param.dialogReference: ID of the Line of Sight to be exported.

param.name: in_include_offsets
param.dialogReference: Specification whether the offsets of observer and target should be added to vertical profile. If the result should be true Line of Sight then this needs to be checked.

param.name: in_global_los
param.dialogReference: Specify if the Line of Sight is local (observer to target) or global (from observer beyond the target).

param.name: in_observer_offset
param.dialogReference: Vertical offset of observers from the surface. Specified as field, as each observer point can have different offset. Necessary if the offsets should be included in the result.

param.name: in_target_offset
param.dialogReference: Vertical offset of the target from the surface. Specified as field, as each target point can have different offset. Necessary if the offsets should be included in the result.

param.name: in_target_x
param.dialogReference: X coordinate of the target point. Used to identify it on Line of Sight. Necessary if Line of Sight is global.

param.name: in_target_y
param.dialogReference: Y coordinate of the target point. Used to identify it on Line of Sight. Necessary if Line of Sight is global.

param.name: in_use_curvature
param.dialogReference: Allows correction for the earth's curvature. Unchecked—No curvature correction will be applied(default). Checked—Curvature correction will be applied.

param.name: in_ref_coeff
param.dialogReference: Coefficient of the refraction of visible light in air (default value 0.13).

tool.summary: A tool for extraction of Line of Sight into CSV file for further processing.

idCitation.resTitle: Export Line of Sight into CSV

dataIdInfo.idAbs: A tool for extraction of Line of Sight into CSV file for further processing.
